headline: 5 Soft Drink Stocks to Watch as Health Trends Shake Up the Industry
summary: Beverages - Soft Drinks industry is bubbling with innovation and health-focused trends, while rising costs and global disruptions add a bitter twist. As consumer preferences shift and digital strategies gain traction, can top players like KO, MNST, KDP, PRMB and ZVIA stay ahead of the curve?
